sentences.en: He refused to disclose his name and address to the police.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝告诉警察他的姓名和住址.

sentences.en: He refused to disclose his name and address.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝透露自己的姓名和地址.

sentences.en: He refused to disclose the identity of the politician.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

sentences.en: He was urgent with me to disclose further particulars.
sentences.cn: 他硬要我说得更详细点.

sentences.en: I am afraid we are not at liberty to disclose that information.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我们无权透露这一信息。

sentences.en: I do not believe I may disclose my routes of access.
sentences.cn: 我有我的路子,这恕我不便奉告.

sentences.en: Neither side would disclose details of the transaction.
sentences.cn: 双方均不肯披露交易细节。

sentences.en: Science can disclose the mysteries of nature.
sentences.cn: 科学能解开自然界的奥秘.

sentences.en: She refused to disclose her name and address.
sentences.cn: 她不肯透露自己的姓名和地址.

sentences.en: Some companies have already voluntarily disclosed similar information .
sentences.cn: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.en: The company didn't disclose how much it expects to gain from the two deals.
sentences.cn: 这家公司未透露这两笔交易的预期获利情况。

sentences.en: The spokesman refused to disclose details of the takeover to the press.
sentences.cn: 发言人拒绝向新闻界透露公司收购的详细情况。

sentences.en: They contend that the company failed to disclose material information.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持认为该公司并未透露实质性的信息。

sentences.en: They disclose a most grave and as yet unexplained tendency.
sentences.cn: 它们揭露了一种极其严重迄今尚难解释的倾向.

sentences.en: Why didn't she say a word? Is there anything in her mind that she finds it hard to disclose?
sentences.cn: 为什么她一言不发,是不是有什么难言之隐?
你愿不愿意自己和盘托出?
